document_data.mainbody:
'''''Fall the Cold Night''''', designed by [[Andy Dempz]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the first part of the Frozen Worlds series.

{{Quote|''In trying to undo the characters' sabotage, the Red Wizards have ripped wide the portal to the Far Realm. Father Llymic's brood swarms forth and the Elder Evil hears their call.''{{Cite adventurers league/Fall the Cold Night|1}}|}}
